{{Infobox dungeon |name = Power Plant |image = [[File:Power Plant.png]] |caption = An overhead map of the Power Plant. |tokens = 1,000 |location = North of Lavender Town. }} The '''Power Plant''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. ==Dungeon Stats== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounters || 13,507 |- | Electabuzz (Boss) || 67,535 |- | Zapdos (Boss) || 101,302 |} ==Pokémon== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Random Encounter !! Boss |- | [[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu || rowspan=7|[[File:Electabuzz.png|40px]] Electabuzz

Chest Item !!
